s.label: Simulator settings
s.desc: These parameters affect the operation of the software.

s.label: Use double precision
s.desc: Determines whether double precision arithmetic is used.

s.label: Keep log file
s.description: Determines whether a log file of the run will be kept on disk. Note that even if this option is set to false, log files will be stored in any OSKAR binary data files produced by the simulator.

s.label: Max. number of sources per chunk
s.description: Maximum number of sources processed concurrently on a single GPU.

s.label: CUDA device IDs to use
s.description: A comma-separated string containing device (GPU) IDs to use on a multi-GPU system, or 'all' to use all devices.
